channel.title: LLaMatters by Chirag Mehta
channel.description: Recent content on LLaMatters by Chirag Mehta

item.title: Readability: Rewriting text to any comprehension level or length
item.description: Need for simplicity ðŸ”— Wikipedia is a great resource for getting a quick overview of a topic. But sometimes the articles are too long or too technical. Simple Wikipedia helps, although it can still be pretty lengthy and not always simple enough.

item.title: Glossary: Acronyms, Definitions, Jargon
item.description: Glossary ðŸ”— Keeping up with new lingo used in the field of Large Language Models (LLMs), itself a small subset of the ever-expanding world of AI/ML, is difficult, because every day new research papers coin new terms for novel algorithms or approaches.

item.title: Introduction
item.description: LLaMatters ðŸ”—ChatGPT & Beyond ðŸ”— As a user, ChatGPT is helpful. For many, it is an easy way to answer detailed questions or write essays and emails. But for those who wish to learn more, it can be a gateway into the world of large language models (LLMs), generative text, and context-aware responses.

item.title: About
item.description: I am Chirag Mehta, programmer from Woodstock, IL. I started this blog to share my thoughts and experience learning about large language models and generative text. You can contact me via this form.
